item.title: Getting started with ejb
item.description: Setting up EJB with JBoss AS 7.1 # 1. Overview In this article we are going to discuss how to get started with Enterprise JavaBeans (EJB). We will use JBoss AS 7.1.1.Final, but you are free to use any server of your choice. 2. Maven Dependencies for Bean In order to use EJB make sure you add the latest version of it to the dependencies section of your pom.xml file:
